title: Morgan Hoit (aka @nycbookgirl) Joins Us To Talk Broadway, Working in Publishing, and #Bookstagram
itunes:title: Morgan Hoit (aka @nycbookgirl) Joins Us To Talk Broadway, Imprints, and #Bookstagram
description:
This week we’re joined by Morgan Hoit, marketing manager at Avid Reader Press and voice of NYC Book Girl (one of our favorite bookstagram accounts!). We chat about everything from her love of theatre and how she manages anxiety, to how she feels about the SoulCycle boycott and the three books she can’t wait to read next year.

Products Mentioned 

  • The Amazon Nightgown 

Books Mentioned 

  • Three Women by Lisa Taddeo
  • The Only Plane in the Sky by Garrett Graff
  • The Yellow House by Sara M. Broom 
  • The Starless Sea by Erin Morgenstern 
  • The Dutch House by Ann Patchett
  • Becoming by Michelle Obama
  • Save Me the Plums by Ruth Reichl
  • Normal People by Sally Rooney
  • Fleishman in in Trouble by Taffy Brodesser-Akner
  • More Than Enough by Elaine Welteroth 
  • Hunger by Roxane Gay
  • The Bucket List by Georgia Clark
  • City of Girls by Elizabeth Gilbert 
  • Mrs. Everything by Jennifer Weiner 
  • Under A Dancing Star by Laura Wood
  • The Luxe Series by Anna Godbersen
  • Widow Basquiat by Jennifer Clement 
  • Fight of the Century by Michael Chabon and Ayelet Waldman 

Sponsor:

Night Pillow: Get 20% off your purchase at discovernight.com with code BOP20


Check out tickets to our Fall live shows in San Francisco, DC, Philly, Atlanta, and Dallas.

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more!

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast.
Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
